itemLabel: George Younger, 4th Viscount Younger of Leckie

wikipedia_page.main: George Kenneth Hotson Younger, 4th Viscount Younger of Leckie, Baron Younger of Prestwick,  (22 September 1931 – 26 January 2003), was a British Conservative politician and banker.

response: *  2003   – George Younger, 4th Viscount Younger of Leckie, Scottish banker and politician, Secretary of State for Scotland (b. 1931)
*  1931   – George Younger, 4th Viscount Younger of Leckie, Scottish banker and politician, Secretary of State for Defence (d. 2003)

link_mentions.page: George Younger, 1st Viscount Younger of Leckie
response: Younger died on 29 April 1929. One of his great-grandsons was the Conservative politician George Younger, 4th Viscount Younger of Leckie (1931–2003), who held ministerial office as Secretary of State for Scotland from 1979 to 1986, and Secretary of State for Defence from 1986 to 1989.

link_mentions.page: George Kenneth Hotson Younger, 4th Viscount Younger of Leckie
